general.leaveEmpty: Leave it empty to disable for this item only

colorCustomizations.description: Manage extra matched characters color customizations. Set to `false` to turn it off

html.matchesDoctypeExclamation: Matches the exclamation point preceding the DOCTYPE tag:
html.matchesEntitiesAmperstand: Matches the amperstand in HTML entities:
html.matchesEntitiesSemicolon: Matches the semicolon in HTML entities:
html.matchesGenericAttributes:
Matches HTML attributes followed by equals and a parameter.
It does not matches the HTML and SVG events attributes.
html.matchesHtmlAttributeValueSeparator:
Matches HTML attribute-value separator (=).
This is a global match.
html.matchesHtmlStyleAttributesLanguageIdenti: Matches HTML Style Type Attribute language identifier.
html.matchesHtmlScriptAttributeLanguageIdenti: Matches HTML Script Type Attribute language identifier.

angular.matchesAngularExpression:
Matches the curly braces preceding and succeeding an angular expression.
For both template string interpolation and temlate expressions.
angular.matchesAngularAnimationTriggerPrefix: Matches Angular animation trigger attribute prefix.
angular.matchesAngularAnimationTriggerName: Matches Angular animation trigger attribute variable name.
angular.matchesAngularBindingAttributeDelimiter:
Matches Angular binding parenthesis and brackets delimiters.
This matches all angular bindings delimiters.
angular.matchesAngularOneWayBindingAnimationTrig: Matches Angular animation trigger decorator inside one-way bindings.
angular.matchesAngularOneWayBindingFirstLevelDep: Matches Angular fisrt level depth properties in one-way bindings.
angular.matchesAngularOneWayBindingSecondLevelDe: Matches Angular second level depth properties in one-way bindings.
angular.matchesAngularOneWayBindingThirdLevelDep: Matches Angular third level depth properties in one-way bindings.
angular.matchesAngularPrefixedAttributesLetPrefi: Matches Angular let- prefixed attributes' prefix.
angular.matchesAngularPrefixedAttributesRefPrefi: Matches Angular ref- prefixed attributes' prefix.
angular.matchesAngularPrefixedAttributesVariable: Matches Angular ref- and let- prefixed attributes' variable name.
angular.matchesAngularPrefixedAttributesRxjsSuff: Matches Angular ref- and let- prefixed attributes' RxJS suffix.
angular.matchesAngularSyntaxSugarAttributesPrefi: Matches Angular syntax sugar attribute decorator.
angular.matchesAngularSyntaxSugarAttributesName: Matches Angular syntax sugar attribute name.

svg.matchesSvgDAttributePathCommands: Matches SVG d attribute path commands.

xml.matchesXmlTagNamespaceDivider: Matches XML/HTML element namespace colon separator.
xml.matchesXmlAttributeNamespaceDivider: Matches XML/HTML attribute namespace colon separator.
xml.matchesXmlStylesheetAttributesLanguageId: Matches xml-stylesheet Type Attribute language identifier.

dtd.matchesDtdDoctypeExclamation: Matches the exclamation point preceding DTD element tags:
